TopicTitle: [1.0.5] Camera Tools v1.5.1 (+dogfight mode, autozoom margin slider) - March 28

Articles.Content: This is a fantastic mod. I do all my current youtube videos with it!

Is anyone aware of mod conflicts with Camera Tools?

It was working fine for me until recently--and I am having a tricky time figuring out what changed in-between--but now any camera mode centers the camera inside the rocket, and when you press End to return to the game camera default, it displays sideways.

There's a chance another mod update broke this but admittedly I haven't been careful about seeing what updates CKAN notices and installs.

(And no, I'm not using Time Control.)

I want to say that camera tools is awesome, and thank you. I am a newbie when it comes to videos, camera tools did the majority of the work. Here's a video I made with 3 of your mods in it.

Is there some way to have the mod remember your target position (set with click)? If I set a position, then press home to put the camera there to check the shot, then go back to default camera, I lose the shot (when I press end it doesn't go back to that position).
is there really no way to use the mouse wheel to zoom??

Is there some way to have the mod remember your target position (set with click)? If I set a position, then press home to put the camera there to check the shot, then go back to default camera, I lose the shot (when I press end it doesn't go back to that position).

First of I'm still pretty green and I got really lucky with a lot of the shots in my videos. That being said a trick that seemed to work for me was setup the angle you want when landed and sitting still. Press home to enter camera mode then end to revert back. Take off and when you are where you want to film press home. Depending on if flyby is selected or not. Your angle will now be set. I hope this helps.

To clarify - does this allow focusing the camera on a specific part on a vessel? I've been looking for a feature like that for ages, it feels essential even just for handling large vessels, nevermind making pretty cinematics. The part focus worked well in previous versions but is broken now.

I work around it by setting the root part to the best observation point for the ship and use the Target Self function to focus there.

Is there any way to stop the camera focusing on center of mass?

Seems to be a huge flaw in the game that the camera needs a work around to let you see inside a service bay or even the crew hatch. This is a serious limitation to ship design. No point in putting anything with right click functionality where the camera will not focus. The camera should be able to focus on any part and not be stuck on center of mass.

You might want to try wasd editor camera, it lets you move the camera quite well, I don't like the way it removes the default scroll wheel config so I generally keep wasd off by default and use the hockey to switch it on when I need greater control. It's pretty essential for making 200 meter long structures.
